verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! Praise the name of the LORD; praise him, you servants of the LORD.

verses.kjv: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,
verses.ct: You who serve in the house of the LORD, in the courtyards of the house of our God,

verses.kjv: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
verses.ct: praise the LORD, because the LORD is good. Sing praises to his name, because it is delightful.

verses.kjv: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
verses.ct: The LORD has chosen Jacob for himself, and Israel as his treasured possession.

verses.kjv: For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
verses.ct: I personally know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord surpasses all gods.

verses.kjv: Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
verses.ct: Whatever the LORD wants to do, he does — in heaven and on earth, in the seas and in every ocean depth.

verses.kjv: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
verses.ct: He draws up clouds from the far edges of the earth; he produces lightning along with the rain; he releases the wind from his storehouses.

verses.kjv: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
verses.ct: He struck down the firstborn of Egypt, both people and animals.

verses.kjv: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
verses.ct: He sent signs and wonders right into the heart of Egypt, against Pharaoh and all his officials.

verses.kjv: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
verses.ct: He defeated powerful nations and killed mighty kings —

verses.kjv: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
verses.ct: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan.

verses.kjv: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
verses.ct: Then he gave their land as an inheritance, an inheritance to his people Israel.

verses.kjv: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
verses.ct: Your name, LORD, lasts forever; your reputation, LORD, endures through every generation.

verses.kjv: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
verses.ct: The LORD will bring justice for his people, and he will show compassion to his servants.

verses.kjv: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men’s hands.
verses.ct: The idols of the nations are just silver and gold, objects crafted by human hands.

verses.kjv: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
verses.ct: They have mouths but cannot speak; they have eyes but cannot see.

verses.kjv: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
verses.ct: They have ears but cannot hear, and there is no breath in their mouths.

verses.kjv: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.
verses.ct: The people who make them will become just like them, and so will everyone who puts their trust in them.

verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
verses.ct: House of Israel, praise the LORD! House of Aaron, praise the LORD!

verses.kjv: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
verses.ct: House of Levi, praise the LORD! All you who are wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD, praise the LORD!

verses.kjv: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: May the LORD be praised from Zion, he who dwells in Jerusalem. Praise the LORD!
